member.name: M:DotNetNuke.Tests.UI.WatiN.Common.WatiNUtil.OpenIEInstance(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Opens a new IE instance with the given settings in front of other windows that are currently open.
member.param: The URL that the IE instance should browse to.
If true the test will be run without displaying any IE instance or steps.
The default time out to use when calling IE.AttachToIE(findby).
If true when a reference to the IE instance is destroyed the actual window will close.
It true the mouse pointer will move to the top left corner of the screen when a new IE instance is created.
member.returns: The new IE instance.
